did.unittitle: University of Kentucky. Physical Plant Division. Custodial Services Department: Donald Maxberry papers
did.abstract: The Donald Maxberry papers (1985-1990, undated; 0.45 cubic feet; 1 document box) primarily comprise flyers, invitations, blank forms, cleaning instructions, cleaning checklists, employment policies, memoranda, correspondence, notes, meeting minutes and committee information documenting the custodial and supervisory work of University of Kentucky custodian/housekeeper supervisor Donald Maxberry.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open to researchers by appointment

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection retains its original order. Where possible original folder names were retained.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Donald Maxberry, custodian and housekeeping supervisor, worked in the Physical Plant Division (PPD) of the University of Kentucky (UK) between 1985 and 1990. Maxberry was the Team 2 supervisor in the Custodial Services department of PPD. His crew worked in the housekeeping zone that included the Fine Arts Building, the Singletary Center, and the Art Museum. He was also a volunteer with the United Way at UK.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: 2024ua023 : [identification of item], University of Kentucky. Physical Plant Division. Custodial Services Department: Donald Maxberry papers, 1985-1990, undated, University of Kentucky Libraries Special Collections Research Center.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Donald Maxberry papers (1985-1990, undated; 0.45 cubic feet; 1 document box) primarily comprise flyers, invitations, blank forms, cleaning instructions, cleaning checklists, employment policies, memoranda, correspondence, notes, meeting minutes and committee information documenting the custodial and supervisory work of University of Kentucky custodian/housekeeper supervisor Donald Maxberry. Maxberry was supervisor at least during the time period of 1985-1990 for the housekeeping zone that included the Fine Arts Building, the Singletary Center, and the Art Museum. Documents include a brown bag lunch entitled Gender and Marriage in Later Life (February 17, 1989); a call for volunteer reading tutors for Operation Educate; the invitation to the Physical Plant Division family day picnic on June 17, 1989; Excel Club information packets and catalogs; and a Maintenance Planning Kit binder.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the University of Kentucky. The University of Kentucky holds the copyright for materials created in the course of business by University of Kentucky employees. Copyright for all other materials has not been assigned to the University of Kentucky. For information about permission to reproduce or publish, please contact the Special Collections Research Center.
